channel.title: Java on Hashnopolis
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Hashnopolis

item.title: Install Java on Linux
item.description: Install manually Step 1: Download the source package from the oracle repository. If your computer is 64-bit, download the x64 version; if it is 32-bit, download the x86 version. Step 2: Extract from the compressed file and move the package folder to /usr/java. rememeber to run these commands as sudo is not the root user. mv downloads-folder/jdk-<version>-linux-xxx.tar.gz /usr/java tar -xvzf jdk-<version>-linux-xxx.tar.gz rm jdk-<version>-linux-xxx.tar.gz Step 3: Add the java path to the ~/.
